name: Version 2.0.0 Beta 8
notes: Added Awards, Added PIREP Comments, Added User Lookup
queries: CREATE TABLE `awards` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` TEXT NOT NULL , `description` TEXT NOT NULL , `imageurl` TEXT NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`));
CREATE TABLE `awards_granted` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `awardid` INT NOT NULL , `pilotid` INT NOT NULL , `dateawarded` DATE NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`));

CREATE TABLE `pireps_comments` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `pirepid` INT NOT NULL , `userid` INT NOT NULL , `content` TEXT NOT NULL , `dateposted` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`))

name: Version 2.0.0
notes: See https://github.com/va-net/flare/releases/tag/v2.0.0
queries: CREATE TABLE `awards` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` TEXT NOT NULL , `description` TEXT NOT NULL , `imageurl` TEXT NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`));
CREATE TABLE `awards_granted` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `awardid` INT NOT NULL , `pilotid` INT NOT NULL , `dateawarded` DATE NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`));

CREATE TABLE `pireps_comments` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `pirepid` INT NOT NULL , `userid` INT NOT NULL , `content` TEXT NOT NULL , `dateposted` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`))
ALTER TABLE `routes` CHANGE `fltnum` `fltnum` TEXT
ALTER TABLE `pireps` CHANGE `flightnum` `flightnum` TEXT;
ALTER TABLE `pireps` ADD `fuelused` INT NOT NULL AFTER `aircraftid`;
